item.title: 4 of 8 - Understanding Who It Is You Are Praying To
item.description: This episode explores principles we can apply from Jesus' teaching on prayer in Matthew 6:9-13. We discuss how starting our prayers by acknowledging God as our heavenly Father affects our heart posture. We also touch on coming to God freely as His children to share all parts of our life, while still revering His holiness. This episode aims to encourage listeners to strengthen their intimacy with God the Father in prayer... Feed: https://feeds.simplecast.com/jQ1dOWzi

item.title: 271 - Survival of the Richest - Douglas Rushkoff (rebroadcast)
item.description: In this episode we sit down with Douglas Rushkoff, a media scholar, journalist, and professor of digital economics who has a new fire in his belly when it comes to the world of billionaire preppers, which comes across in his new book Survival of the Richest: Escape Fantasies of the Tech Billionaires â inspired by his invitation to consult a group of the worldâs richest people on how to spend their money now to survive an apocalypse they fear is coming within their lifetimes. Feed: https://feeds.simplecast.com/N5eKDxJI
